7f3fee9f-39ff-4f2b-b088-8bbeb5f3dd39.name: Select level of night vision
7f3fee9f-39ff-4f2b-b088-8bbeb5f3dd39.notes: 4 is fairly realistic, 9 is perfect, or use infravision

d82763fa-972e-417d-b430-40449011b863.name: Select an optional role in society

features.situation: on any task that utilizes sense of smell
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

e9b2f98b-78e4-4a10-9cd0-c86dbc918fd4.name: Sadism
e9b2f98b-78e4-4a10-9cd0-c86dbc918fd4.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.

features.situation: from those who become aware of your Sadism unless they are from a culture that holds life in little esteem

4994667c-09cd-4b57-bb02-349e4279f19d.name: Stolid mostly harmless muscle
4994667c-09cd-4b57-bb02-349e4279f19d.notes: Select some relevant traits (and can remove stubbornness)

features.situation: on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage
